PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02152018-03-06,  PCH,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Film Board - Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder Approving of the ENTRY BY THE NATIONAL FILM BOARD, INTO A COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the PROFESSIONAL INSTITUTE OF THE PUBLIC SERVICE OF CANADA, in respect of its employees in the Administrative and Foreign Service category and the Scientific and Professional category for a term of four (4) years; it comes into force on July 1, 2014 and expires on June 30, 2018.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
